column5: Well it was definitely a nail biter...but Gussy held on for the win and first canadian to win the Bassmaster Classic!!!https://www.bassmaster.com/bassmaste...e-classic-win/
Definitely fished a good tournament. He didn't look rattled yesterday when he still only had 1 fish at 11:30 but he stayed with his plan and made it happen. I was rooting for him!
First Canadian...second international angler to win the Classic...awesome job Gussy!

great job, most guys here probably dont care about the bass classic, but the way gussy uses "walleye" technique to dominate these guys on some lakes, sure is not something to overlook. winning the biggest tourney in bass with what is basically a "jig n a minnow"

Not to mention he fishes a Lund and most of the other guys are in their rangers, phoenixes, skeeters, etc. He definitely had the right game plan (and has the last two tournaments on the TN River). Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
